Package com.hexaforce.warzone

Class WarzoneEngine

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.WarzoneEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WarzoneEngine extends Object implements Serializable
This is the entry point of the Game and keeps the track of current Game State.
